channel.title: The Court Wizard - Reflect Master
channel.description:
The Court Wizard as a reflection centered support Class role.
**Passive Ability:** **Stubborn Mind** - You gain occupy and redirect Immunity after 2 effects (instead of the usual 3).
**Day Ability:** **Mirror Aura** The next ability used on you gets reflected. Does not expire with day/night change. Can effect Day AND Night abilities. Non reflectable abilities (like King Point finger, Decide Fate) get negated. Ability not affected by occupation, redirect. _1 Use_ (Remember this ability only reflects once, but stays active (kinda as a passive) until used ). No Feedback when Ability succesfully reflected.
**Night Abilities:** **Magic Barrier**: Stays the same **Reflect Barrier**: Replaces Tornado. Works kinda like a supercharged Magic barrier. All abilities directed at the targeted Player get reflected. Gives feedback on succesfull Reflect. Will also reflect immune players. _2 uses_

item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
You would be correct - Pants on Fire was removed in one of the beta builds, 0.9.8 if I remember correctly.

While Mirror Aura defends yourself from day abilities, Pants on Fire was a bit more offensive, allowing you to target somebody else and making their day abilities target themself instead of their intended target. I think that’s a bit more useful in general.
